name: Slender's cow
description:
Slender's cow:

You are farmer and your cow has gone crazy. There is only one correct choice - RUN!!! But first you need to collect 8 bottles of milk.

Tip: collect batteries to increase flashlight's charge. 

Controls:

W, A, S, D - to move

F - flashlight toggle

Right mouse button - change distance of flashlight's light

Esc - menu quit/open or show cursor

Have a nice game)
